description: this is a government contract for technology service
full_summary:
**Governance Document Automation Solution Tender**
=============================================

### Overview

The Canadian Commercial Corporation has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply and delivery of a state-of-the-art Document Automation Solution. The proposed solution must be an industry-standard, commercially available software that automates the data entry process by machine parsing documents and performing ERP system data entry functions or alerting system users based on the parsing confidence level.

### Requirement Specifics

*   **Technical Experience**: Vendors must have at least one project experience as a Prime Contractor in implementing Artificial Intelligence solutions for the Government of Canada.
*   **Security Clearance**: Vendors must possess a valid "Reliability Security" clearance from the Canadian and Industrial Security Directorate (CISD) of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) at the time of bid closing.

### Key Documents

The following attachments are available for review:

*   [106205.181 --- ccc-rfp --- automation --- en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26585/106205.181---ccc-rfp---automation---en.pdf)
*   [106205.181 --- ccc-rfp --- automation --- sample-exemplaire-de-documents.zip](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26585/106205.181---ccc-rfp---sample-exemplaire-de-documents.zip)
*   [106205.181 --- automation --- qa-no.-1 --- 2023-12-20 --- en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26585/106205.181---automation---qa-no.-1---2023-12-20---en.pdf)
*   [206205.181 --- ccc-rfp --- automation --- annc --- submission --- en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26585/206205.181---ccc-rfp---automation---annc---submission---en.pdf)

### Important Dates

*   **Tender Closing Date**: January 26, 2024, at 14:00
*   **Amendment Date**: January 26, 2024
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
